titleInfo.title: A Tool for Semi-Automatic and Interactive Annotation of Dialogue Utterances with Information States
Proceedings of DiaBruck (the 7th Workshop on Semantics and Pragmatics of Dialogue)

bibliographicCitation.dgps: Schlangen, D., Lascarides, A. & Baldridge, J. (2003). A Tool for Semi-Automatic and Interactive Annotation of Dialogue Utterances with Information States. In I. Krujiff-Korbayová & C. Kosny (Hrsg.), Proceedings of DiaBruck (the 7th Workshop on Semantics and Pragmatics of Dialogue) (S. 205-206). Saarbrücken.
